items.title: Kean University Announces Michael Graves School of Architecture
items.abstract: The school’s curriculum will intensively utilize the New York metropolitan area and the Wenzhou region of China, where Kean has an English-speaking campus.

items.title: A Small Step for Space Force Is Not a Giant Leap for Uniform Design
items.abstract: The unveiling of the new military branch’s name tape — “U.S. Space Force,” embroidered in blue — was overshadowed by reactions to its familiar camouflage uniform.
keywords: United States Defense and Military Forces

items.title: What’s the Right Number of Taxis (or Uber or Lyft Cars) in a City?
items.abstract: Technology has made it easier to identify and manage the optimal supply, but it also depends on which problem you’re trying to solve.

items.title: At Reed Krakoff’s New SoHo Boutique, the Art and Design Are as Compelling as the Fashion
items.abstract: From lamps that appear to have burst through the walls to an installation by the Bouroullec brothers, the space is no ordinary luxury flagship.

items.title: China locks down a northwestern city to subdue a small outbreak.
items.abstract: Lanzhou, with about four million people, reported six new coronavirus cases on Tuesday, and a total of 39 over the past week.
